originalText.text: After having a horrible accident, by a drunk driver.  I sustained heavy injuries. And my first call was to Carrion Accident & Injury Attorneys.  Thankfully they helped me out with my treatments and got me the compensation I felt I deserved.  Thank you for your hard work and professional team.  Thank you Dennis Carrion and Santiago Sturba for keeping with me and my schedule with my doctors.  Thank you Omar as well.  Highly recommend!!!!!!

text.text: After having a horrible accident, by a drunk driver.  I sustained heavy injuries. And my first call was to Carrion Accident & Injury Attorneys.  Thankfully they helped me out with my treatments and got me the compensation I felt I deserved.  Thank you for your hard work and professional team.  Thank you Dennis Carrion and Santiago Sturba for keeping with me and my schedule with my doctors.  Thank you Omar as well.  Highly recommend!!!!!!

originalText.text:
I would like to say having never done a lawsuit the Carrion Firm was the best choice!  From the first phone call (than sit down) with Omar Rodriguez to the kind and patient service from Miranda Moran I felt like Everything was going to work out!
And it did!  I would Highly recommend the Carrion Firm for any accident and/or personal injury.
